attributes.action: Refund my NI contributions, if the NHS is sold to the Americans
attributes.background: I pay my NI contributions every month, to pay for my state pension (which wont be around for much longer) and for my healthcare, which is under threat of sale to the Americans. I hereby request HM government to refund my NI contributions should the NHS be privatised.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
